name: "The Legend of Zelda: Majora's Mask" 1 Quiz  | 10 Questions

questions.text: Where does the game take place?
questions.explanation:
Termina.

	The Land of Termina is featured in this game, but it features many of the same characters.  Hyrule is in "Ocarina of Time," Koholint is in "Link's Awakening (DX)" for Gameboy, and Labrynna is from "Oracle of Ages" also for Gameboy.

questions.text: Which is NOT in West Clock Town?
questions.explanation:
The Milk Bar.

	The Milk Bar is in East Clock Town by the exit to Termina Field.  The rest are in West Clock Town.

questions.text: How much do you pay Tingle for a Woodfall Map in Clock Town?
questions.explanation:
40 Rupees.

	You pay 40 Rupees for Woodfall, and 5 Rupees for Clock Town's map.  You can find Tingle throughout Termina, but these two maps can be found in North Clock Town.  It is 20 rupees cheaper however to buy a Woodfall map in the Southern Swamp from Tingle.

questions.text: What is the only song you learn within the first cycle of three days?
questions.explanation:
Song of Time.

	You learn the Song of Time on the first cycle as a Deku Scrub when you go to the top of the Clock Tower during the festival.  The only way to play it is to retrieve your Ocarina from the Skull Kid and remember it from Princess Zelda.  Then you start your next 3 day cycle.

questions.text: Who do you save from the Woods of Mystery?
questions.explanation:
Koume.

	Koume needs a potion to leave the Woods of Mystery, so you need to see her sister Kotake in her potion shop on the outskirts of the woods for a potion.  Koume and Kotake were also a boss from "The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time" where they played Twinrova of the Spirit Temple.  In this game, Koume operates a sightseeing tour of the swamp.

questions.text: What weapon do you get from Woodfall Temple?
questions.explanation:
Hero's Bow.

	The Hero's Bow can be earned after defeating a Lizalfos.  It has many uses throughout the game, but can only be used in Link's true form.

questions.text: Who is the boss of Woodfall Temple?
questions.explanation:
Odolwa.

	You face the masked jungle warrior, Odolwa.  Afterwards, you get your usual complimentary heart piece and remains, but this time, you also get a song.

questions.text: How do you get the Deku Princess back to the Deku Palace?
options: She takes the Sightseeing Tour Boat
questions.explanation:
In a Bottle.

	That's right.  She fits in a cramped bottle all the way back to the Deku Palace.  After she's released, she sort of bounces on the king's stomach for a while.

questions.text: Who gives you the Mask of Scents?
questions.explanation:
A Butler.

	The Deku Princess waves you off to the butler who sends you on a long journey through the Deku Caves.  You get the Mask of Scents which helps you sniff up mushrooms for Kotake's potions.

questions.text: At the end of Woodfall Temple, which of these masks still can not be earned?
questions.explanation:
Garo's Mask.

	The Garo's mask is earned by using Epona to beat the Gorman Brothers.  You can't race Epona unless you save Romani Ranch on night one.
